name: Duelicious
description:
Duelicious is a PVP dueling game based in a western stylized world. You must join the dueling games and beat your opponent on a best of 5 match style!

Controls:

Space-Bar    -> Roll. Evade your opponents shots / slashes by rolling away.

Left-Click     -> Slash your opponent with your knife.

Right-Click  -> Fire your pistol and kill your opponent.

External Assets:

Animations:

The animations are from https://www.mixamo.com/#/ .

Audio:

 All the music and sound effects we use in the game are taken from https://www.epidemicsound.com/ except for the character's screams which are taken from https://freesound.org/.
